title: An Act relative to Massachusetts policy and procedures for missing and abducted children

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Payano, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1755) of Pavel M. Payano for legislation relative to Massachusetts policy and procedures for missing and abducted children.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 06/26/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
